are u guys so lame that you wont even try to see whats the problem with this game

There are no viruses.

Some douchebags are using freeware that throw up alerts over over false positives. They only do this to appear affective.

609team has confirmed its a false positive, and plenty of other programs (free a paid [norton, bitdefender, etc]) all show the patch as clean.

Don't listen to faggots and enjoy them game.

I'm going to be scanning the files in the iso once its complete though. 

Gurox might just be a douche who got hacked while downloading the torrent. Luckily the program I use blocks port scans.

There has been a few varying reports of viruses (metal.dll with reloaded, as well as alleged infected autorun files (?), infected patches, etc).

Its hard to know whats true when theres so much shit flying around from potential sock puppets.

Scanned iso with spybot, malwarebytes, and bitdefender.

All three came up clean. The download works fine, the install appears to stop at 13% because its installing a large file, so don't get your panties in a knot.

Enjoy this game, 609team did an awesome job.
